plotzy.summary: Live zoning lookups functional. Vision clear: comprehensive spatial analysis from address input.

items.text: Live zoning lookups working: Edmond OK (Zone A), OKC (R-1 with CUP)
Underwriting skill tested on real property: 32nd St Apts, OKC
Zoning database: 10 cities, 120K zones, 566 MB spatial data acquired
Product vision: address → zoning + parcel boundary + surrounding parcels + property data
Trust signal: screenshot public GIS portals rather than generate custom maps
Barriers: OKC GIS has CAPTCHA, county assessors block VPS datacenter IPs
CRE data layers: spatial, property, market, transactions, income, demographics, regulatory, risk
